pinfix.title: Pin Fixer
pinfix.description: Make map pins scale less dramatically with zoom level.

minScale.name: Min Scale
minScale.desc: The smallest scale for map pins (zoomed all the way out).

maxScale.name: Max Scale
maxScale.desc: The largest scale for map pins (zoomed all the way in).

zoomFloor.name: Zoom Floor
zoomFloor.desc: The pin scale won't change when zoomed out further than this.

zoomCeil.name: Zoom Ceiling
zoomCeil.desc: The pin scale won't change when zoomed in further than this.

hudScale.name: Pin HUD Scale
hudScale.hudScale.desc: Some modules, such as Pin Cushion and POI Teleporter add HUDs to map pins. This setting adjusts scale factor for those HUDs.

notes.description: Hide pins below or above certain zoom levels. (default range is 0.1 - 3)

minZoomLevel.name: Minimum Zoom Level
minZoomLevel.desc: Pin will be hidden when zoom is less than this level.

maxZoomLevel.name: Maximum Zoom Level
maxZoomLevel.desc: Pin will be hidden when zoom is greater than this level.
